name: Go K.razy
description:
Go K.razy is a 2D puzzle-adventure game with multiple endings where you play as Ex-Mad Scientist, now turned Mayor, Karl Razy.

Use quick thinking and creative inventions to help Karl through a busy schedule as mayor of Somewheresville. Known for his big thinking and optimism, K.Razy has become a household name as an eccentric innovator and an unorthodox inventor and your job is to prove it by solving day-to-day problems!

We used 'Moonshot thinking' as the concept behind our game and design.
